JobFullDesc:
Repost by SoundCloud is the music industry’s fastest-growing music distribution service. As a business, we enable musicians to monetize their music on platforms such as SoundCloud, Spotify, Apple Music and many more. We also provide our users with clear revenue reporting, as well as promotion opportunities.
As a culture, we believe that the world of streaming music is changing, and while anyone has the ability to build their own audience, they should also have the ability to make a living from that audience.
SoundClouds Talent Team is responsible for driving enormous growth in the business. We pride ourselves on setting high goals and having a ton of fun achieving them together. We take pride in our culture greatly and only invite optimistic, hardworking, and motivated people to join our team.
We are looking to hire a highly motivated individual, who is organized, has great communication skills, and is able to work with cross-functional teams and collaborate closely between partners within an agile environment. Preferably, this person should have a background at a record label, publisher, or distributor.
Responsibilities:

Handle new artist & partner applications and onboarding to our distribution platform
Collaborate with Sales Ops to come up with new processes to optimize organic signings and increase client revenue potential
Educate clients on best practices and release planning within our dashboard
Do discovery & qualification with our current customers to better understand how they’re using and gaining value from SoundCloud
Strategize with artist’s on new and effective ways to market and promote assigned releases
Compile and communicate internally, marketing drivers and release strategy
Work with label services on executing release campaigns for existing artists
Lead client support through various channels with a focus on client retention
Upsell services within our platform to existing clients
Maintain relationships with referral partners and review incoming client prospecting
Have the autonomy to operate beyond your role and help the team continuously improve and optimize our process, training, use of technology, and any other aspects of our business

Qualifications:

3-5+ years proven experience in an account management role
2+ years music industry experience ideally label, publishing, or distribution
Familiar with Performance Right Organizations (PRO) - i.e. BMI, ASCAP, SESAC
YouTube CMS certification highly preferred
Experience with Content Operations within music is a plus 
Enjoy working in a collaboratively driven environment
Make others around you better while achieving your own goals
Deep understanding of account management tactics and client relations
Be coachable (don’t just do what we say, but rather be self-aware and reflective, and digest feedback critically and adapt to overcome challenges)
Be friendly, hardworking and demonstrate compassion and thoughtfulness in your professional communication

Diversity at SoundCloud:
SoundCloud is for everyone. Diversity and open expression are fundamental to our organization; they help us build a social platform and global community where anyone can create, discover, and share sounds. We acknowledge the challenges in our industry, and strive to develop an inclusive culture where everyone can contribute.
